name: Theme Park U.K.
overview: It is the year 2050 and you are standing at the entrance to a "THEME PARK'. This park is very different from the ones people used to visit back in the 1990s. There are no "tame" rides in this park; instead you are thrown into "real-life" acts and situations where you have to use your wits and your intelligence to survive the "day out". The park is divided into sections and in order to visit each section you will need to use the "token". Any items found in one section can be used to solve problems encountered in another. Hidden in each section is a "special" object. When you have found them all just take them to the main entrance and you will to allowed to go home. Returning to the main entrance for any other reason will terminate your visit to the "THEME PARK". So prepare yourself for the "day out" of a lifetime and let's hope you live to tell the tale ....
